item.title: Activity Outline
item.description: Standing up, standing out Spend 10 minutes discussing the following questions in your groups: What do we have in common? How do we stand out from each other? Is standing out helpful or unhelpful? Are there any qualities that could be both helpful and unhelpful depending on the context? Nominate a scribe from your group to head to Mentimeter (use the code: 8793 5437) and add points from your discussion to each slide.
